clinical_study.brief_title: Bronchial Allergen Provocation Tests in Asthmatics in Guangzhou
clinical_study.official_title: Bronchial Provocation Tests With House Dust Mite in Allergic Asthma in Guangzhou

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to establish the methodology of bronchial provocation tests with house dust mites in China, and to evaluate its safety and effects on upper and lower airways inflammation.

detailed_description.textblock:
After screening,each participant undergo baseline lung function test,airway inflammation evaluation (blood and sputum eosinophils count,interleukin-13 (IL-13),FeNO)and airway responsiveness tests(methacholine bronchial provocation,nasal histamine provocation).
On the second day,the participant undergo bronchial house dust mites challenge tests.
On the third day,the participant undergo the lung function test,airway inflammation evaluation (blood and sputum eosinophils count,IL-13,FeNO)and airway responsiveness tests(methacholine bronchial provocation,nasal histamine provocation).

primary_outcome.measure: percentages of the participants that tested positive to house dust mites bronchial provocation
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes after house dust mites bronchial provocation

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of the percentages of eosinophils in sputum, nasal lavage and fractional exhaled nitric oxide (FeNO) from baseline
Changes of provocative concentration induced a 20% decrease in forced expiratory volume at one second (FEV1) to methacholine before and after house dust mites bronchial provocation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after house dust mites bronchial challenge

secondary_outcome.measure: percentages of the participants that tested positive to house dust mites bronchial provocation measured by impulse oscillometry
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 minutes after house dust mites bronchial provocation

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of provocative concentration induced a 60% increase in nasal airway resistance to histamine before and after house dust mites bronchial provocation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after house dust mites bronchial challenge
secondary_outcome.description: By Comparison with methacholine provocation test

other_outcome.measure: correlate of IL-4,IL-13,periostin with provocative concentration induced a 20% decrease in FEV1 to house dust mite in asthmatic
other_outcome.time_frame: 30 mins and 24 hours after house dust mites bronchial challenge
other_outcome.description: By Comparison with methacholine provocation test

other_outcome.measure: Incidence and Severity of Adverse Events During The House Dust Mite Bronchial Provocation Test
other_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes, 7 hours and 24 hours after house dust mites bronchial provocation
other_outcome.description: By Comparison with methacholine provocation test at 30 min and 24 hours after challenge test.

arm_group.description: asthma patients that sensitive to house dust mites.
normal controls with or without sensitive to house dust mites.

intervention.description: house dust mites(two-fold increasing concentration of house dust mite (HDM) extract, dilutions prepared starting from 1:8, 1:16, 1:32, 1:64, 1:128, 1: 256, 1:512, 1:1024,……)
